entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_Languages_id
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Languages_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `primaryLanguageId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `secondaryLanguageId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `imageUrl` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`primaryLanguageId`) REFERENCES `Languages`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE RESTRICT , FOREIGN KEY(`secondaryLanguageId`) REFERENCES `Languages`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE RESTRICT )

indices.name: index_WordGroups_id
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_WordGroups_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

indices.name: index_WordGroups_primaryLanguageId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_WordGroups_primaryLanguageId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`primaryLanguageId`)

indices.name: index_WordGroups_secondaryLanguageId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_WordGroups_secondaryLanguageId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`secondaryLanguageId`)
